agent.text: What have you heard about {famFriendRelationship} {famFriendName}? How's {pronounSubj} doing?

user.text: I don't want to talk about {pronounObj} today

agent.text: Any news from {pronounObj}?
Oh, excellent. Is {pronounSubj} happy?
Well, wish {pronounObj} good luck from me!

user.text: Yes, and {pronounSubj} got a raise too

agent.text: <FACE EXPR=\"SMILE\"/> Even better! <FACE EXPR=\"WARM\"/>

user.text: Yes, I was worried. But not anymore

agent.text: Glad to hear that. That's really good news!
Oh that's great for {pronounObj}
uh-huh. I can understand.

user.text: Yes, {pronounSubj} has a lot of grandchildren

agent.text: <FACE EXPR=\"SMILE\"/> really, well, that's a nice part of life! <FACE EXPR=\"WARM\"/>

user.text: Yes, {pronounSubj}'s waited a long time for a grandchild

agent.text: people say that grandchildren are a real treat
well, I'm sure that will change in a month or so!
<FACE EXPR=\"SMILE\"/> how nice to get new clothes! <FACE EXPR=\"WARM\"/>

user.text: I'm not so interested in that sort of thing

agent.text: Oh, really? well, that means you don't have to go shopping!

user.text: I like to do other things besides shopping

agent.text: <FACE EXPR=\"SMILE\"/> oh really, where? Want me to keep track of the weather where they're going? <FACE EXPR=\"WARM\"/>
Ok, then you can temporarily change their zip code using the enter information option on the main menu.
Do you wish you could go somewhere special?

user.text: No, I don't like to travel

agent.text: well, I hope {famFriend} enjoys the trip!
well, that's good.

user.text: I wish I had some new friends

agent.text: <FACE EXPR=\"SMILE\"/> Try meeting someone when you go walking! <FACE EXPR=\"WARM\"/>

user.text: Maybe I will call up someone I already know
Yes, {pronounSubj} told me all about it

agent.text: <FACE EXPR=\"SMILE\"/> great for you. When we do your calendar, we can add the visit <FACE EXPR=\"WARM\"/>

user.text: I'm not sure yet when {pronounSubj} is coming

agent.text: Let me know when you settle it then we can put it in your calendar

so how did it go?

agent.text: maybe today is good time to give {pronounObj} a call
did you get to see any pictures?
<FACE EXPR=\"SMILE\"/> well, glad it was a good trip. <FACE EXPR=\"WARM\"/> Got any plans yourself?

I see
so how is the job going?

agent.text: maybe today is good time to give {pronounObj} a call

agent.text: That's excellent!

user.text: Only okay. {pronounSubj} doesn't like it so much

agent.text: <FACE EXPR=\"CONCERN\"/> Oh, that's too bad! <FACE EXPR=\"WARM\"/>

user.text: yes, maybe it will get better

agent.text: <HEADNOD/> yeh, I hope so.
<HEADNOD/> I agree
so is there anything else new with {pronounObj} ?
I see
glad to hear it
is {pronounSubj} still coming?
was it a good visit?
really, maybe it will be better next time

user.text: No, it really didn't work out well

agent.text: <FACE EXPR=\"CONCERN\"/> that's too bad. I guess not all visits are great <FACE EXPR=\"WARM\"/>
I'll look forward to hearing about the visit
<FACE EXPR=\"CONCERN\"/>oh that's a shame. <FACE EXPR=\"WARM\"/> Remember to tell me when we talk about the calendar next

Is {pronounSubj} recovering?
That's good to hear
Oh, that's too bad. Have you been to see {pronounObj}?

agent.text: Yeh, good idea
I'm sure {pronounSubj} appreciates that
yes, <HEADNOD/> it's hard not to complain when you are sick

user.text: That's all there is to say

agent.text: Sometimes recovery is slow, but it's good {pronounSubj}'s on the mend
I hope everything works out
Is that still the case?
Loneliness is hard. Maybe you should give {pronounObj} a call.
oh, that's nice to know
Has {pronounSubj} found one yet?
Sorry to hear that
oh, glad to hear that!

user.text: I don't want to talk about this anymore

agent.text: oh, okay.
That takes a long time to recover from
have you visited {pronounObj} recently?

user.text: Yes, it was good to see {pronounObj}
I don't want to talk about this anymore

agent.text: okay, <HEADNOD/> I understand
<EYEBROWS DIR=\"UP\"/> is the recovery going well? <EYEBROWS DIR=\"DOWN\"/>
Oh, that's good to know | That is good news! | I bet you are glad for {pronounObj}

user.text: No, it's going to be a long time yet

agent.text: <FACE EXPR=\"CONCERN\"/> sorry to hear that <FACE EXPR=\"WARM\"/>

that's good to hear

if you haven't talked to {pronounObj}, why don't you give {pronounObj} a call?

you can pick it up the next time you go for a walk.

well, I think that would be good to do.
how about a nice card? You can pick one up when you go out

well, I'm sure {famFriendName} would like hearing from you

I see. You could give {pronounObj} a call or talk to {pronounObj} by video call

Maybe another time
Well, keep calling. I think it helps.

user.text: {pronounSubj} is postponing a visit to me

tell me the next time we update your calendar.
how disappointing!
